Title: Ground up
Definition: Monetary amount indicating the total loss before any impact of insurance is applied.

Title: Insured
Definition: Monetary amount of loss that is insured by private or (sub)sovereign insurance solutions.

Title: Gross Loss
Definition: Monetary amount indicating an insurers loss after deductibles, limits or co-insurance are applied, but before any reinsurance.

Title: Count
Definition: A number indicating, for example, people affected, displaced, or killed, or assets exposed or damaged.

Title: Net Loss Pre-Cat
Definition: Modeled loss representing the grosss loss with facultative and per-risk reinsurance applied but not catastrophe treaties.

Title: Net Loss Post-Cat
Definition: Modeled loss representing the net-pre-cat loss with catastrophe treaties applied.
